chunkstream.description: A ReadStream: emit data chunk by chunk.

combine-streams.description: Append streams and data into one mother stream

contentstream.description: Make a readable stream by input content, content could be `String`, `Buffer`, `Object`, `Number` and so on.

duplex-child-process.description: Spawn a child process as a duplex stream

error-inject.description: inject an error listener into a stream

hash-stream.description: Get a hash of a file or a stream

passthrough-counter.description: Get the total buffer length of a stream.

promise-transform-streams.description: Create and resolve a promise of streams

raw-body.description: Get and validate the raw body of a readable stream.

stream-to-array.description: Concatenate a readable stream's data into a single array
